app_description.message: Custom keyboard shortcuts for ChatGPT: set keys to scroll up/down, copy, join responses, start a new chat, and toggle the sidebar.

label_toggle_sidebar_folders.message: Toggle Sidebar Folders Down for Repairs

tt_send.message: Check to make Control + Enter send the message. Uncheck to disable.

tt_stop.message: Check to make Control + Backspace stop response generation. Uncheck to disable.

tt_scroll_up_one.message: Scroll up one message at a time. To disable any shortcut, delete the assigned letter.

tt_scroll_down_one.message: Scroll down one message at a time.

tt_scroll_top.message: Scroll up to the first message.

tt_pgup_pgdown.message: Check to make your keyboard's PageUp and PageDown keys scroll the conversation instead of the input box. Uncheck to disable.

tt_send_top_bar.message: Check this box to move the model selector and header to the bottom. A small change that makes a big difference.

tt_opacity_slider.message: Choose whether the bottom bar always stays visible (slider right) or fades to be less distracting (slider left = invisible). It will always show when you move your mouse over it.

tt_copy_plain.message: Activate the lowest visible, native copy button. Copies any response as plain text.

tt_strip_md.message: Remove Markdown *s and ### from text copied with Alt+C. Requires clipboard access. Uncheck to disable.

tt_select_copy.message: Simulates selecting text with mouse and pressing Ctrl+C. Press multiple times to cycle through visible messages.

tt_select_copy_behavior.message: Select any message, only yours, or only ChatGPT’s.

tt_select_assistant.message: Only select messages sent by ChatGPT.

tt_select_user.message: Only select messages sent by you.

tt_disable_autocopy.message: Check to disable auto-copy (i.e. it only selects the text).

tt_toggle_sidebar_folders.message: Down for Repairs. Toggle sidebar folders and GPT list. Persists after reload.

tt_search_chats.message: Search chats (clicks native button, even if sidebar is hidden).

tt_prev_thread.message: Go to previous thread in current conversation. Clicks lowest visible < button.

tt_next_thread.message: Go to next thread in current conversation. Clicks lowest visible > button.

tt_edit_msg.message: Click edit on a previous message. If multiple, clicks lowest.

tt_join_all.message: Joins all ChatGPT responses (excluding your messages) and copies to clipboard.

tt_join_separator.message: Customize separator between joined items. Use \n for line breaks.

tt_join_code.message: Joins all code blocks and copies to clipboard. Excludes user input.

tt_code_separator.message: Customize separator between code blocks. Use \n for line breaks.

tt_hide_arrows.message: Hide the up and down arrow buttons.

tt_hide_corners.message: Hide the 'Copy All' buttons in the bottom right.

tt_showModelPicker_plain.message: Show the ChatGPT Plus model picker (4o, o3, o4-mini, o4-mini-high, 4o-mini)

tt_pick_model_plain.message: Switch ChatGPT Plus model using Alt or Control + number keys (1–5)

tt_use_Alt_for_picker.message: Select ChatGPT model using Alt+1 (4o), Alt+2 (o3), Alt+3 (o4-mini), Alt+4 (o4-mini-high), Alt+5 (4o-mini)

tt_use_Control_for_picker.message: Select ChatGPT model using Control+1 (4o), Control+2 (o3), Control+3 (o4-mini), Control+4 (o4-mini-high), Control+5 (4o-mini)

tt_regenerate.message: Clicks the lowest visible regenerate response button.

tt_rememberSidebarScrollPositionCheckbox.message: Normally, the sidebar scrolls back to the top when you open, close, or reload it. Check this box to return to the same spot in the sidebar.
